outside.name: Outside the House
description: You are outside. You see a spooky mansion off in the distance.
The moon is just starting to rise.
hint:
Not much to do out here other than to enter the house.
Use the cd command to move.

files.name: paper
contents: You see a piece of paper lying on the ground.
You pick up the paper and read the following message:
Welcome to my spooky mansion game!
I hope you have a fun time.
Never stop coding, and have a Happy Halloween!
You put the paper back on the ground for the next person.

house.name: Inside the House
description: You are inside the Foyer of the house. You see a single door ahead of you. Cobwebs litter the house.
hint: Not much to do here, other than to cd into the next room.

library.name: Library
description: You enter into a surprisingly warm and cozy library.
Curled up on a nearby chair is a fat cat.
On the floor nearby is a book.
You don't really anywhere else to go, though.
hint:
The cat might know how to read the book.
 cat book

files.name: book
contents: You attempt to read the book, but alas it is unreadable.
In fact, it just appears to say 'MEOW' over and over again.
If only someone could help you translate the mysterious language.

hallway.name: Hallway
description: You enter a stately hallway lit by candles. Before you stands a man with a deathly pallor and long, pointed teeth. He grins maliciously and says with a thick accent:
*"I wouldn't mind a bit of a bite, or at least **half a bite**. In other words, do you know what I am looking for?"*
He clearly wants you to say something. Perhaps there is a word you can type that will satisfy him?
hint: When you talk to the vampire, he asks you what half a bite (byte) is.
If you don't know, ask Google.
Then, enter that as the prompt.

kitchen.name: Kitchen
description: In the kitchen, there appears to be a bunch of zombie (processes)!
Although they aren't moving around very much, they are blocking your path.
You need to thin the herd somehow.
hint: Zombie processes are stray programs that are not easily stopped.
